function Jukebox({ mainData }) { const playedRecord = mainData.find(record => record.isPlayed); return (
{playedRecord ? `${playedRecord.artist} - ${playedRecord.title}` : 'Jukebox'}
{playedRecord ? : } {/* */}
); } export default Jukebox;
